fields.description: TestFSImage#testCompression tests LZ4 codec and it fails when native library is not available.

comments.body:
Attaching the error log.
{noformat}

The rebase is only for imports, so I'm committing this based on Nicholas's +1.
Committed this to trunk, branch-3.1, branch-3.0, branch-2, branch-2.9, and branch-2.8. Thanks [~szetszwo] for reviewing this.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #13819 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/13819/])
HDFS-12156. TestFSImage fails without -Pnative (aajisaka: rev 319defafc105c0d0b69b83828b578d9c453036f5)
* (edit) hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hdfs/server/namenode/TestFSImage.java
This bug affects branch-2.7 as well.
Cherry picked the commit to branch-2.7. There's a trivial conflict in import, so attached my branch-2.7 patch for the record.
